author: 4 Ever Green
description:
What if the world’s biggest reserves were found by mistake?
From Pakistan’s accidental gas field to Bolivia’s lithium salt flats and a hidden gold belt in Ethiopia these 16 discoveries were never planned. 
No billion-dollar tech, no deep research just pure luck, curiosity, or a broken drill that changed everything. 
Discover how oil, gold, gas, and lithium reserves worth billions were uncovered by accident and how they reshaped the world’s economy.


#4EverGreen #AccidentalDiscoveries #NaturalReserves #GoldDiscovery #OilField #Lithium #NatureFacts
title: They Accidentally Discovered the Largest Oil Reserve Ever! found in India
